_hosting_guide.step1: Open acc-converter.html (admin-only URL), pick a model, compile it to .acc format
_hosting_guide.step2: Download the .acc bundle (manifest.json, config.json, tokenizer.json, shards/ folder)
_hosting_guide.step3: Upload to Google Drive or R2 CDN — share publicly or use a direct-download link
_hosting_guide.step4: Set hostedBase URL above to the CDN path (no trailing slash)
_hosting_guide.step5: Users now download your pre-compiled .acc shards — no on-device compilation, 3-5x faster first load
